price: हमारी ओर से आदेश के कारण। निःसंदेह हम ही भेजने वाले थे।
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
